prompts: Create a large bug-type Pokemon with striking yellow and black patterns.
Imagine a flying insect Pokemon that buzzes around in forests.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a bee, showcasing its stinger and wings.
Give me an aggressive bug Pokemon that uses poison in battles.
Show me a Pokemon that can evolve into a powerful bee-like creature.
Generate a Pokemon with sharp wings and a distinctive yellow body.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has a strong attack.
